item.title: How to: logistic regression pipeline in Python
item.description: Table of Contents Link to heading Introduction Logistic regression overview Exploratory data analysis and feature engineering Model fitting and performance metrics Feature selection Feature importance I recently stumbled upon a nice Superstore Marketing Campaign Dataset during my weekly (as one does :) ) browsing sessions through Kaggle. The Kaggle data card has great motivation build around the dataset that I am pasting here: Context: A superstore is planning for the year-end sale.
